about_the_game:
Begin this delightful adventure as Robin. In this cozy exploration game set in a forest, our young and curious explorer wanders around a narrow wooden course, discovering new paths and helping animals throughout her journey.




During the course of the game, players will solve puzzles to help Robin complete her journey throughout the woods, unlock new paths, make new friends, and help villagers and animals navigate the changing forest trail. Traverse through a series of intricate mazes by manipulating paths—turn and flip sections to create a continuous route leading to the goal.





Success hinges on rearranging the pathways and helping animals to help you connect starting points with destination markers, all while avoiding obstacles and pitfalls along the way.
Guide Robin as she wanders the intricate twists and turns of the path ahead where every step reveals new wonders and challenges awaiting to be discovered.

During the course of the game, players will solve puzzles to help Robin complete her journey throughout the woods, unlock new paths, make new friends, and help villagers and animals navigate the changing forest trail. Traverse through a series of intricate mazes by manipulating paths—turn and flip sections to create a continuous route leading to the goal.





Success hinges on rearranging the pathways and helping animals to help you connect starting points with destination markers, all while avoiding obstacles and pitfalls along the way.
Guide Robin as she wanders the intricate twists and turns of the path ahead where every step reveals new wonders and challenges awaiting to be discovered.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M

name: Robin: The Twisted Timber Trail

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join Robin and navigate narrow wooden paths, solve puzzles, and help animals and villagers as you uncover hidden trails and secrets.
